dmca.title: Dustindiamond.com
dmca.body:
September 16, 2003

[private]
New York, New York 10017

SENT BY CERTIFIED MAIL

Re: dustindiamond.com domain name

Dear [private]:

Please be advised that we represent Dustin Diamond and this letter is sent demanding that you cease and desist your use of the domain name dustindiamond.com.  

It has come to our attention that, without the knowledge or consent of Mr. Diamond, that you have obtained the domain name dustindiamond.com and are using it to operate a website.  (Please See Attachment A).  Your website has a picture of Mr. Diamond and purports to be that of Mr. Diamond by stating
